title: Comfort Style Lounge Sofa Light Grey Alcantara/Alcantara
body:
A mid-century design classic by Michel Ducaroy, this Mobelaris style of a 1973 icon is made completely from high-quality polyurethane foam and upholstered in fabric. This cult classic features its recognizable curved outline and pleated fabric design, making it the ideal lounge chair to lay back and relax.
Perfect as a pair or paired with Togo Ottoman.
